remarks: Property of a polarity.  (Contributed by NM, 26-Nov-2014.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lpolpolsat.a $e |- A = ( LSAtoms ` W ) $.
lpolpolsat.p $e |- P = ( LPol ` W ) $.
lpolpolsat.w $e |- ( ph -> W e. X ) $.
lpolpolsat.o $e |- ( ph -> ._|_ e. P ) $.
lpolpolsat.q $e |- ( ph -> Q e. A ) $.
lpolpolsatN $p |- ( ph -> ( ._|_ ` ( ._|_ ` Q ) ) = Q ) $.
